CustomField.description: Used for the Lab team to track Sample in Storage. Samples for US organic claims will be stored by claim # at Kankokee; samples stored in Canada use a sequence number that will reset annually
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Sample Number format is: {CountryCode}{SectorCode}-{Sequence Number}-{YY}, e.g. • CARES-1005-19 • USRES-1004-19 • CACOM-1002-19 The sequence numbers reset annually to 0001
CustomField.label: Sample Number
